message: I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a high-value product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value it holds, but I am only willing to pay up to $12000 for it.

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13500. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still believe the product should be within my budget. I am willing to pay $12500 for it.

I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $12500. I can do $13000, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your position, but I would like to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay $12750 for the product.
